publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4761 Elaine Smith: A Charter for Change—That the Parliament expresses concern that the current economic crisis in Britain is resulting in mass unemployment, repossession of homes, public service cuts, a threat to equality and increasing national debt; considers that The People’s Charter for Change sets out what must be done to get out of this crisis and put people first, before the interests of bankers and speculators; notes that the aim is to get one million signatures for the charter; urges attendance at the public meetings being held on 10 October 2009 in Edinburgh and 11 October 2009 in Glasgow to raise awareness of the charter, and supports the six principles outlined in the charter to deliver change, hope and a fairer Britain. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Jamie Hepburn*, Marlyn Glen*, John Wilson*, Rob Gibson*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S3M-4761 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Bill Butler*

S3M-4761 Elaine Smith: A Charter for Change—That the Parliament expresses concern that the current economic crisis in Britain is resulting in mass unemployment, repossession of homes, public service cuts, a threat to equality and increasing national debt; considers that The People’s Charter for Change sets out what must be done to get out of this crisis and put people first, before the interests of bankers and speculators; notes that the aim is to get one million signatures for the charter; urges attendance at the public meetings being held on 10 October 2009 in Edinburgh and 11 October 2009 in Glasgow to raise awareness of the charter, and supports the six principles outlined in the charter to deliver change, hope and a fairer Britain. Supported by: Bill Kidd, Jamie Hepburn, Marlyn Glen, John Wilson, Marilyn Livingstone, Bill Butler
S3M-4761 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-4761 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-4761 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Helen Eadie*
S3M-4761 A Charter for Change (lodged on 2 September 2009) Angela Constance*
